text: Nachhatar Singh Johal (born 1979) is an Indian sailor. He was born in Jalandhar. He competed at the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, where he placed 23rd in the Finn class. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Jalandhar Category:Indian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of India Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Finn
title: Nachhatar Singh Johal
